document.full_text: republican mitt romney said on wednesday that reversing healthcare reforms passed in 2010, a signature element of president barack obama's agenda, would be a top priority if he were elected president in 2012.
document.title: mitt romney says overturning health law "first act"
lines_and_colors: republican mitt romney said on wednesday that reversing healthcare reforms passed in 2010, a signature element of president barack obama's agenda, would be a top priority if he were elected president in 2012.
